attributes.action: revoke the agreement that the UK Government and the EU allows the US Government access to credit card and email address information for UK citizens travelling to the US.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recent Press articles have highlighted this disclosure which will be available to insecure organizations in the US and elsewhere.  The result will be that the individuals affected can suffer fraudulent transactions involving their credit cards and will be liable to receiving unsolicited emails.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "revoke the agreement that the UK Government and the EU allows the US Government access to credit card and email address information for UK citizens travelling to the US."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11279.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/UStravel/
